br.octahedron.cotopaxi.cloudservice
Interface DistributedLock

public interface DistributedLock

A distributed reentrant lock (semaphore) over memcache. It means that, once acquired the lock, another attempt to call lock the same resource will be successful. By the same logical, try to unlock a resource previously unlocked has no effects.

Author:
Danilo Queiroz - daniloqueiroz@octahedron.com.br, VÃ­tor Avelino - vitoravelino@octahedron.com.br
See Also:

Method Summary
 String getName()
          Gets this lock's name
 void lock()
          Tries to obtain the resource lock.
 boolean tryLock()
          Tries to obtain the resource lock immediately.
 void unlock()
          Unlocks the resource.
 

Method Detail

tryLock

boolean tryLock()
Tries to obtain the resource lock immediately. If the lock isn't free, return without the lock.

Returns:
true if the lock was acquired, false otherwise.

lock

void lock()
          throws TimeoutException
Tries to obtain the resource lock. If the lock isn't free, it waits for. If the method returns normally the lock was acquired. However, this method can throws a TimeoutException if its wait to long, avoiding deadlocks.

Throws:
TimeoutException - If takes to long to acquire the lock. The timeout is implementation dependent.

unlock

void unlock()
Unlocks the resource. If the thread doesn't have the lock, nothing is done.

getName

String getName()
Gets this lock's name

Returns:
the lock's name
